column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - House of Cards (2015) #3
column6: STEPHEN KING'S DARK FANTASY EPIC RETURNS-AS EDDIE DEAN COMES FACE TO FACE WITH THE GUNSLINGER! Eddie enters the lion's den-Balazar's "Leaning Tower"! Balazar has Henry Dean in his clutches and demands to know what happened to the drugs Eddie Dean was supposed to deliver. Nowhere to run and nowhere to hide-Eddie's got to explain his failure...but can he do so without revealing his worlds-spanning secret?
column8: | writer:Peter David | writer:Robin Furth | artist:Piotr Kowalski | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco
